document.full_text: alexander semin scored at 18:24 of overtime and the washington capitals rallied for a 2-1 win over the rangers in game 1 of the eastern conference playoff series.
document.title: capitals 2, rangers 1 (ot): semin's overtime goal lifts caps over rangers in game 1
lines_and_colors: alexander semin scored at 18:24 of overtime and the washington capitals rallied for a 2-1 win over the rangers in game 1 of the eastern conference playoff series.
